name: strand-localstore
description: A non-rendered wrapper around the localStorage api

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: Key with which to associate data under in the current local store.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Data to save in the current local store.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: Whether or not the component should update the local store when its value changes. If auto is set to false, save or sync must be called to save the component's value to the local store.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Update the component's value and save to the local store.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The value to save in the component and local store.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Save the component's current value to the local store, or load the value from the local store if empty.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Load value from the current local store.

methods.name: hasKey
methods.description: Returns a Boolean representing whether or not the current local store contains a value associated with the given key

arguments.name: key
arguments.description: The key to look up in the local store
